title: 后台ic报错看不懂 求救
author: very
txt_content:
如题 后台报错 看不懂是什么意思 请教能看懂的大神

2013-08-11 22:12:22 [WARNING] [IC2] API ERROR: ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity
.TileEntityMatter@1f7a0f5 (0:528,8,12) didn't implement demandsEnergy() properly
, no energy from injectEnergy accepted (512) although demandsEnergy() requested
512.
2013-08-11 22:12:38 [WARNING] [IC2] API ERROR: ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity
.TileEntityMatter@1942dd5 (0:212,6,185) didn't implement demandsEnergy() properl
y, no energy from injectEnergy accepted (512) although demandsEnergy() requested
 512.
2013-08-11 22:12:45 [WARNING] [IC2] API ERROR: ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity
.TileEntityMatter@1f7a0f5 (0:528,8,12) didn't implement demandsEnergy() properly
, no energy from injectEnergy accepted (512) although demandsEnergy() requested
512.
2013-08-11 22:12:56 [WARNING] [IC2] API ERROR: ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity
.TileEntityMatter@1f7a0f5 (0:528,8,12) didn't implement demandsEnergy() properly
, no energy from injectEnergy accepted (512) although demandsEnergy() requested
512.
2013-08-11 22:13:06 [WARNING] [IC2] API ERROR: ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity
.TileEntityMatter@1942dd5 (0:212,6,185) didn't implement demandsEnergy() properl
y, no energy from injectEnergy accepted (512) although demandsEnergy() requested
 512.
2013-08-11 22:13:17 [WARNING] [IC2] API ERROR: ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity
.TileEntityMatter@1942dd5 (0:212,6,185) didn't implement demandsEnergy() properl
y, no energy from injectEnergy accepted (512) although demandsEnergy() requested
 512.

replies.author: acaly
replies.txt_content:
大概是说ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity.TileEntityMatter这机器（就是物质机吧）有问题，没有正常地和ic2的能源网络接口协作，结果上虽然不会崩溃，不过可能会导致供电不正常什么的吧……
原因应该是ic2自己的Bug（重新去下个稳定版），不过没准也是别的ic2扩展mod（就是支持ic2能源的mod）中包含了不正确的ic2api造成的（看看只有ic2一个mod会不会出错，如果没错的话就排查出错的是哪个ic2扩展mod）。

replies.author: ak47xsb
replies.txt_content: 删除MOD，解决问题，直接下整合玩就OK

replies.author: very
replies.txt_content:
ak47xsb 发表于 2013-8-13 00:10 
删除MOD，解决问题，直接下整合玩就OK
要是那么简单 我还会来提问么？
删除MOD时候的轻巧 那不就纯净服了么？那我开服务器的意义何在........
